name: N&Detective (Timon2)
description:
A group of friends decided to go on vacation. To a house deep in the Scottish woods. The place was quite cozy and peaceful. If only they knew what was waiting for them there...

Upon arrival, the house was empty, as everything was covered with dust. No one has lived in this house for a long time. Tired from the road, friends decide to go to bed right away. At night there is a bloodthirsty murder of one of the friends. The main character, as well as a former detective, is going to deal with this and find the killer. But immediately faces a number of problems. Every night there is one murder, and we need to find out as soon as possible who this mysterious maniac is.

The game has 2 endings. 1 good, 2 bad. Go through the game twice to find out what would have happened if you had acted differently
